name: Introduction to Internet of Things
description: Covers IoT basics including applications, devices, protocols, and communication models.

name: Things and Connections
description: Quiz on IoT devices, connectivity, networking models, and communication protocols.

name: Sensors, Actuators and Microcontrollers
description: Covers IoT hardware components, types of sensors, actuators, and microcontroller basics.

name: Building IoT Applications
description: Focuses on IoT system design, application development, and real-world use cases.

description: Covers IoT security challenges, solutions, and future trends in IoT ecosystems.

name: Soft skills-Personality Development
description: Focuses on communication, teamwork, leadership, and personal growth skills.
